reactor.io.net

Class Spec.HttpClient<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.bus.spec.DispatcherComponentSpec<Spec.HttpClient<IN,OUT>,HttpClient<IN,OUT>>
      • reactor.io.net.Spec.HttpClient<IN,OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - The type that will be received by the client
    OUT - The type that will be sent by the client
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Supplier<HttpClient<IN,OUT>>
    Enclosing interface:
    Spec

    public static class Spec.HttpClient<IN,OUT>
extends DispatcherComponentSpec<Spec.HttpClient<IN,OUT>,HttpClient<IN,OUT>>
    A helper class for specifying a HttpClient
    Author:
    Stephane Maldini
